Docs.summary: Provides a base class for collecting layout scheme characteristics.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> class is the base class for types that collect the various characteristics common to a specific user interface (UI) layout scheme, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings>.
## Examples The following example shows how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> object for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control. For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement a Custom ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md).
